result.title: Exploitation plan
result.description: This plan formalises the approach for moving from a funded project to a self-sustaining future. result.title: First Business Development and Sustainability Review
result.description: This deliverable will update and review our progress in business development for the first half of the project. Including key events, markets targeted, SME conversion, CoE collaboration and progress on the KPIs. This data will then be used to map out the business development plan for the rest of the project. This deliverable will also review our approach to sustainability in light of the improvements made in the project.
